verses.text_plain: On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king.
verses.verse_html:
1On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king. ▼
▼ could…: Heb. the king’s sleep fled away

footnotes.body_text: ▼ could…: Heb. the king’s sleep fled away
footnotes.body_html: ▼ could…: Heb. the king’s sleep fled away

verses.text_plain: And it was found written, that Mordecai had told of Bigthana and Teresh, two of the king’s chamberlains, the keepers of the door, who sought to lay hand on the king Ahasuerus.
verses.verse_html:
2And it was found written, that Mordecai had told of Bigthana and Teresh, two of the king’s chamberlains, the keepers of the door, who sought to lay hand on the king Ahasuerus. ▼
▼ Bigthana: also called, Bigthan
 , ▼
▼ door: Heb. threshold

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Bigthana: also called, Bigthan

verses.text_plain: And the king said, What honour and dignity hath been done to Mordecai for this? Then said the king’s servants that ministered unto him, There is nothing done for him.
verses.verse_html: 3And the king said, What honour and dignity hath been done to Mordecai for this? Then said the king’s servants that ministered unto him, There is nothing done for him.

verses.text_plain: And the king said, Who is in the court? Now Haman was come into the outward court of the king’s house, to speak unto the king to hang Mordecai on the gallows that he had prepared for him.
verses.verse_html: 4And the king said, Who is in the court? Now Haman was come into the outward court of the king’s house, to speak unto the king to hang Mordecai on the gallows that he had prepared for him.

verses.text_plain: And the king’s servants said unto him, Behold, Haman standeth in the court. And the king said, Let him come in.
verses.verse_html: 5And the king’s servants said unto him, Behold, Haman standeth in the court. And the king said, Let him come in.

verses.text_plain: So Haman came in. And the king said unto him, What shall be done unto the man whom the king delighteth to honour? Now Haman thought in his heart, To whom would the king delight to do honour more than to myself?
verses.verse_html:
6So Haman came in. And the king said unto him, What shall be done unto the man whom the king delighteth to honour? Now Haman thought in his heart, To whom would the king delight to do honour more than to myself? ▼
▼ whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth

tokens.text: unto him, What shall be done

footnotes.body_text: ▼ whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth

verses.text_plain: And Haman answered the king, For the man whom the king delighteth to honour,
verses.verse_html:
7And Haman answered the king, For the man whom the king delighteth to honour, ▼
▼ whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth

verses.text_plain: Let the royal apparel be brought which the king useth to wear, and the horse that the king rideth upon, and the crown royal which is set upon his head:
verses.verse_html:
8Let the royal apparel be brought which the king useth to wear, and the horse that the king rideth upon, and the crown royal which is set upon his head: ▼
▼ Let…: Heb. Let them bring the royal apparel
 , ▼
▼ which the king…: Heb. wherewith the king clotheth himself

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Let…: Heb. Let them bring the royal apparel
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Let…: Heb. Let them bring the royal apparel

footnotes.body_text: ▼ which the king…: Heb. wherewith the king clotheth himself
footnotes.body_html: ▼ which the king…: Heb. wherewith the king clotheth himself

verses.text_plain: And let this apparel and horse be delivered to the hand of one of the king’s most noble princes, that they may array the man withal whom the king delighteth to honour, and bring him on horseback through the street of the city, and proclaim before him, Thus shall it be done to the man whom the king delighteth to honour.
verses.verse_html:
9And let this apparel and horse be delivered to the hand of one of the king’s most noble princes, that they may array the man withal whom the king delighteth to honour, and bring him on horseback through the street of the city, and proclaim before him, Thus shall it be done to the man whom the king delighteth to honour. ▼
▼ bring…: Heb. cause him to ride

tokens.text: him, Thus shall it be done

footnotes.body_text: ▼ bring…: Heb. cause him to ride
footnotes.body_html: ▼ bring…: Heb. cause him to ride

verses.text_plain: Then the king said to Haman, Make haste, and take the apparel and the horse, as thou hast said, and do even so to Mordecai the Jew, that sitteth at the king’s gate: let nothing fail of all that thou hast spoken.
verses.verse_html:
10Then the king said to Haman, Make haste, and take the apparel and the horse, as thou hast said, and do even so to Mordecai the Jew, that sitteth at the king’s gate: let nothing fail of all that thou hast spoken. ▼
▼ let…: Heb. suffer not a whit to fall

tokens.text: of all that thou hast spoken

footnotes.body_text: ▼ let…: Heb. suffer not a whit to fall
footnotes.body_html: ▼ let…: Heb. suffer not a whit to fall

verses.text_plain: Then took Haman the apparel and the horse, and arrayed Mordecai, and brought him on horseback through the street of the city, and proclaimed before him, Thus shall it be done unto the man whom the king delighteth to honour.
verses.verse_html: 11Then took Haman the apparel and the horse, and arrayed Mordecai, and brought him on horseback through the street of the city, and proclaimed before him, Thus shall it be done unto the man whom the king delighteth to honour.

tokens.text: him, Thus shall it be done

verses.text_plain: And Mordecai came again to the king’s gate. But Haman hasted to his house mourning, and having his head covered.
verses.verse_html: 12And Mordecai came again to the king’s gate. But Haman hasted to his house mourning, and having his head covered.

verses.text_plain: And Haman told Zeresh his wife and all his friends every thing that had befallen him. Then said his wise men and Zeresh his wife unto him, If Mordecai be of the seed of the Jews, before whom thou hast begun to fall, thou shalt not prevail against him, but shalt surely fall before him.
verses.verse_html: 13And Haman told Zeresh his wife and all his friends every thing that had befallen him. Then said his wise men and Zeresh his wife unto him, If Mordecai be of the seed of the Jews, before whom thou hast begun to fall, thou shalt not prevail against him, but shalt surely fall before him.

verses.text_plain: And while they were yet talking with him, came the king’s chamberlains, and hasted to bring Haman unto the banquet that Esther had prepared.
verses.verse_html: 14And while they were yet talking with him, came the king’s chamberlains, and hasted to bring Haman unto the banquet that Esther had prepared.
